price: Mi nismo stvorili nebesa i Zemlju i ono što je između njih igrajući se.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqnā al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā lāʿibīna
